Package org.bm.blaise.scribo.parser

This package contains functionality to recognize "tokens" of various type in a String input, and to convert them into a SemanticNode, which has functionality similar to a method.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Grammar This interface specifies the functions necessary to parse a generic expression into a tree of tokens.
GrammarParser Converts an input String into a SemanticNode, using an associated grammar.
SemanticNode Represents the semantic tree which can be used to actually calculate values.
 

Class Summary
BooleanGrammar This class describes the supported language elements of a boolean parsing library.
RealGrammar This class describes the supported language elements of a real-variable parsing library.
 

Enum Summary
ParseException.ParseErrorCode  
 

Exception Summary
ParseException Basic exception handling for parsing string inputs.
SemanticTreeEvaluationException This exception is generated when a semantic tree cannot be completely evaluated.
 

Package org.bm.blaise.scribo.parser Description

This package contains functionality to recognize "tokens" of various type in a String input, and to convert them into a SemanticNode, which has functionality similar to a method.

Errors in input are handled by the ParseException class.

Extensibility is handled primarily by the Grammar interface, which is used by the tokenizer to determine the types of tokens corresponding to different symbols. Currently supported grammars are the BooleanGrammar and the RealGrammar.
